City Secretary Department

The City Secretary Department is committed to providing quality customer service to the citizens of Edinburg and facilitating the legislative process by performing the following duties: 

  • Advisory Boards, Commissions, & Committees
  • Birth and Death Records
  • City Council Meeting Agendas and Minutes Recording
  • Code of Ordinances
  • Custodian of Records/TSLAC 
  • Passports
  • Proclamations


415 W University Dr.
Edinburg, Texas 78539
  • City Hall Phone: 956-388-8204
  • Utilities Phone: 956-388-8212
  • Utilities Emergencies Phone: 956-388-8220
  • Utility Billing Phone: 956-388-1896
  • Planning & Zoning Phone: 956-388-8202
  • City Secretary Phone:  956-388-1854
  • Human Resources Phone: 956-388-1873
  • HelpLine Phone: 956-259-4357
